sen.j: 隆妙寺（りゅうみょうじ）は、奈良県大和高田市に所在する日蓮正宗の寺院。
sen.e: Ryumyo-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Yamato-takada City, Nara Prefecture
Ryumyo-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Yamato-takada City, Nara Prefecture
Ryumyo-ji Temple is a temple of the Nichiren-shoshu sect located in Yamato-takada City, Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。

sen.j: 山号は法聚山（ほうじゅさん）。
sen.e: Its sango (honorific mountain prefix) is Hojusan.
Its sango (literally, "mountain name"), which is the title prefixed to the name of a Buddhist temple, is Hojusan.

sen.cmt: 文頭のみ大文字にしました。

sen.j: 1988年（昭和63年）6月23日 - 建立される。
開基は日蓮正宗大石寺第67世法主日顕上人。
sen.e: The patron of the temple in its founding was Nikken Shonin, the 67th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.
The patron of the temple in its founding was Nikken Shonin, the 67th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.
The patron of the temple in its founding was Nikken Shonin, the 67th head priest of Nichiren-shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple.

sen.j: 奈良県大和高田市旭北町18
sen.e: 18 Asahi-kita machi, Yamato-takada City, Nara Prefecture
18 Asahi-kita machi, Yamato-takada City, Nara Prefecture
18 Asahi-kita machi, Yamato-takada City, Nara Prefecture

sen.cmt: 文頭のみ大文字にしました。

sen.j: 桜井線・和歌山線 高田駅 (奈良県)から徒歩10分
sen.e: 10 minute walk from Takada Station (Nara Prefecture)
10 minute walk from Takada Station (Nara Prefecture)
10 minute walk from Takada Station (Nara Prefecture) on Sakurai line and Wakayama line
